item.title: Singapore welcomes the arrival of Japanese fashion retail concepts
item.description:
Source: WMH Group. Kafuku. World Mode Holdings Group (WMH Group) aims to improve the Singapore fashion retail sector by establishing its first international branch, iDA Singapore (iDA’SG). WMH Group is a Japanese fashion retail consultancy firm known for strengthening its clients’ brands. As Japan’s top recruiter for beauty and fashion sales professionals, their Singapore branch will offer expert guidance and support to enhance retail staff skills. “As Japan’s leader in retail job placements, we’ve placed 100,000 retail staff with approximately 1,000 clients, primarily in fashion and luxury...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-welcomes-the-arrival-of-japanese-fashion-retail-concepts/
